newsitem.title: JORDAN: Jordan's PM Kabariti confirms he resigning.
newsitem.headline: Jordan's PM Kabariti confirms he resigning.

text.p: Jordan's Prime Minister Abdul-Karim al-Kabariti confirmed on Wednesday he was resigning and said King Hussein would appointed former premier Abdul-Salam al-Majali to replace him.

"His Majesty wanted to have a new start and he wanted to choose Abdul-Salam al-Majali to lead the new team for the coming period so as to continue with the path of reform and reconstruction and give some more vigour to our role, whether in the Arab role or in the region," Kabariti told reporters before leaving for the royal palace to offer his resignation.
